pr_title: [Bugfix] Fix for Missing Axes Labels in Exam-Scores

timeline.bodyText:
We use just plural Teilnehmer (= Anzahl an Teilnehmern) in other places:

  
    
      Artemis/src/main/webapp/i18n/de/exam.json
    
    
         Line 69
      in
      71c154e
    
    
    
    

        
          
           "participantsColumn": "Teilnehmer", 
        
    
  


Not sure what the guideline here is.
timeline.author: FrankeLukas

replies.bodyText:
When switching between languages the label texts do not update, only when reloading the page.

Not worth solving this imo. Who switches their language constantly? If you reload the page it works
replies.author: stefanwaldhauser

replies.bodyText:
